case.title: Romance & Relationship - 29 (SW London.)
case.text: Its quite simple really. I'm looking for a single man for dating and potential romance. I'm 29, Educated, good job, own home, car, cat. You're in London, single 30+, employed, intelligent, interesting and looking for a relationship, you're not a player. Send me an email and a picture (of your face) and lets start talking. Thanks for reading
